header.name: MARTA PANCALDI
intro: I’m a computer science graduate who loves writing code for work and for fun.
I love solving problems and have a strong desire to learn and continuously improve my skills.
Fiction writer, oboist, philosophy-enthusiast and travel photographer in my free time.

jobs.name: Free University of Bolzano – Manchester (Remote)
jobs.description: Collaboration in writing an article for IEEE about contracts and policies of cloud services, to give companies guidance on how to be compliant following the changes introduced by the new European law on data protection (GDPR).

jobs.name: ICT Group – Reggio Emilia, Italy (Hybrid)
jobs.description: A 300-hour curricular internship, which led to a 5-month part-time contract. During this time, I developed a customized HRMS web application that allowed employees and HR staff to manage holiday, sick leave, and business travel requests.

publications.title: Cloud Computing and the New EU General Data Protection Regulation
publications.publisher: IEEE Cloud Computing, Nov./Dec. 2018, pp. 58-68, vol. 5

publications.title: automating the evaluation of student programming exercises.
research on exploiting Self-Admitted Technical Debt for updating / reverting code versions in a context of emergent events in Systems of Systems.

projects.title: PokémonGo Connect
projects.description: working on a plaTorm that allows players of PokémonGo to find friends from all over the world, based on an algorithm to find “matches” for region-based challenges (e.g., player from region A, looking for players from B, C, D, and not E), raids and other activities.

projects.title: Advent of Code
projects.description: I completed all 2015-2022 challenges using mainly Kotlin, Java and Python.

projects.title: Raspberry PI dashboard
projects.description: set of customised dashboards (weather, air quality, Covid19 cases, stocks, alerts from projects...) to be displayed on a screen and powered by a Raspberry Pi.

projects.title: Italian Fiscal Code
projects.description: Android app to compute the Italian tax code, extract user’s details and verify correctness; published on the Play Store with 100000+ downloads.

projects.title: xbar plugin
projects.description: display build & deployment statuses of preferred Bamboo branches and other team-relevant information, also contributing to the open-source xbar (previously known as BitBar) project.

projects.title: GESS Hackathon (Shanghai)
projects.description: Global Entrepreneurship Summer School on Food and Sustainability. I participated in a hackathon hosted by Tongji University, and developed a MVP of an app for supermarket customers to locate and purchase discounted and near-to-expiry food.

projects.title: “Silicon Valley Study Tour”
projects.description: organised tour of the major companies and universities in the San Francisco Bay area for the most talented Italian students.

projects.title: Google “Inside Look”
projects.description: workshop on Cloud technologies at Google Warsaw for Computer Science students graduating in 2017 (invitation via selective contest, fully funded).

skills.names: React, Angular, Vue, jQuery, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, TailwindCSS, MaterialUI, Prime
Spring Boot, JSP, Django, Flask, ASP.NET, Node.js, Express, Drupal
MySQL, Postgres, MongoDB, MS SQL Server, Firestore
TDD, BDD, Junit, Mockito, Cucumber, Selenium, PACT, Jest, Espresso

hobbies: Working on personal dev projects, following courses and tech talks.
Photography, video editing, computer graphics, videogames.
Reading novels and essays, technical and creative writing.
